title: Survey shows many European Facebook and Instagram users embellish their posts
text:
Survey shows many European Facebook and Instagram users embellish their posts 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
A new study conducted by HTC in Europe suggests that Facebook and Instagram's users routinely use deception to give off a social media perso...
